title: Food delivery app design
description: Experience the convenience of a seamless food delivery app designed for your cravings. From a sleek and intuitive interface to a swift order processing.

body.raw:
<Image
  src="/projects/fooddelivery/onboard.png"
  alt="Bigstore"
  width={2580}
  height={1691}
  caption="Seamless design from splash screen to on-boarding"
/>

<Image
  src="/projects/fooddelivery/home.png"
  alt="Bigstore"
  width={2580}
  height={1691}
  caption="Home page and search results"
/>

<Image
  src="/projects/fooddelivery/Checkout.png"
  alt="Bigstore"
  width={2580}
  height={1691}
  caption="Items checkout, profile view, order success and custom network error"
/>
